nomedia_title.message: Can't see the media you're looking for?

nomedia_description.message: Start the video (and skip ads if any) to help detect the media. Or report missing media.

show_nomedia_button_tooltip.message: Click here if you can't find your video

leave_review_description.message: We hope you're enjoying Video DownloadHelper :) Would you mind writing a nice review on the addon website?

show_notification.message: Show notification when download is complete

saveas_detected_warning.message: We have detected that your browser shows a 'Save As' dialog, once the download is finished. We recommend disabling that option in your browser settings

private_browsing_warning.message: Video DownloadHelper is not enabled in a Private/Incognito windows. You need to turn on that option manually (this is not required).

history_limit.message: Forget download history after X days

show_in_context_menu.message: Access commands from right-click in page

prefer_highest_quality.message: Select highest available quality instead of 1080p by default (slower download, higher quality).

history_warning.message: We do not record your download history. Do you want Video DownloadHelper to remember your download history?

history_warning_2.message: Don't worry, everything stays on your machine. We value your privacy.

download_failed_description.message: Sadly we failed at downloading that specific media. We try to support as many websites as possible, so it would help a lot if you could report that error (it's anonymous!).

download_interrupted_description.message: We managed to download your file, but there was a network issues, so the file might be shorter than expected. We try to support as many websites as possible, so it would help a lot if you could report this problem (it's anonymous!).

download_with_drm_failed_description.message: Something didn't work. And we think this video has DRM. We do not support videos with DRM.

no_youtube_description.message: Unfortunately, the Chrome Web Store does not allow extensions for downloading YouTube videos so we could not include this feature in the Chrome version of the extension.

premium_yt_required_description.message: Without Premium status, a YouTube download can only be performed 2 hours after the previous one.

premium_required_description.message: Without Premium status, an HLS or MPD download can only be performed 2 hours after the previous one.

youtube_too_many_downloads.message: Oops, YouTube seems to be blocked

youtube_too_many_downloads_description.message: YouTube sometimes will limit how many videos can be requested. Nothing we can do about sadly. Try again later.

audio_only_for_this_website.message: Always audio only for this website

not_playing_broken_description.message: Report the failing media. We will do our best to figure out why it failed (we send the video URL anonymously - we do not track you!)

not_playing_broken_solution_2.message: it's modern, safe and Open Source.

not_playing_default_player.message: Make sure your video player is set as your system default video player

not_playing_default_player_solution_wind.message: In Windows' "Control Panel", click on "Default Programs", and change the default programs for your player.

not_playing_default_player_solution_mac.message: Open download directory right-click on the video file. Click 'Get Info'. In the 'Open With' section, select IINA. Click the 'Change All' button.
